spark.executor.maxMemory.definition: Maximum memory used in the driver

spark.executor.memoryUsed.name: spark.executor.memoryUsed
spark.executor.memoryUsed.definition: Amount of memory to use per executor process

spark.executor.rddBlocks.definition: Number of RDD blocks in the driver

spark.executor.totalShuffleWrite.definition: Number of shuffled bytes in the driver
